div.p: In the near future, spirits and monsters are in full sight.
In the kingdom of Tanbarun lives Shirayuki, an independent and strong-willed young woman.
Buntarou doesn’t know what he wants to do in the future.

div.h2: HaruChika: Haruta to Chika wa Seishun Suru
div.p: The original novels revolve around two high school students named Haruta and Chika.
